attributes.action: ask Her Majesty the Queen to dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses scandal suggests that some of our members of parliament have a limited understanding of the words honesty, integrity or ethics. To restore the public's faith in our elected representatives, a general election should be called with ALL candidates having had to pass a rigorous selection or reselection process that will establish their fitness for office and their absolute commitment to place the interests of those whom they serve above their own.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
